p: The study was conducted with 24 male Sprague-Dawley rats, weighing 100–120 g, purchased from Chennur Suppliers, Malaysia. The animals were maintained in a temperature-controlled room (22 ± 1 °C and a 12 h light/dark cycle) and fed with standard rat chow (Gold Coin Holdings, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia) and free access to water. The experiment protocols including diabetes induction and sacrifice operation were approved by the Universiti Putra Malaysia, Animal Care and Use Committee (UPM/IACUC/AUP-R090/2014).
